GS24vakyp1pu:2058: karaṇena hi sarveṣāṃ vyāpāro vyavadhīyate // BVaky_3,7.94 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2059: kriyāsiddhau prakarṣo 'yaṃ nyagbhāvas tv eva kartari /
GS24vakyp1pu:2060: siddhau satyāṃ hi sāmānyaṃ sādhakatvaṃ prakṛṣyate // BVaky_3,7.95 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2061: asyādīnāṃ tu kartṛtve taikṣṇyādi karaṇaṃ viduḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2063: ātmabhede 'pi saty evam eko 'rthaḥ sa tathā sthitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2064: tadāśrayatvād bhede 'pi kartṛtvaṃ bādhakaṃ tataḥ // BVaky_3,7.97 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2067: stokasya vābhinirvṛtter anirvṛtteś ca tasya vā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2069: dharmāṇāṃ tadvatā bhedād abhedāc ca viśiṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2070: kriyāvadher avaccheda- viśeṣād bhidyate yathā // BVaky_3,7.100 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2076: ārād apy upakāritve svātantryaṃ kartur ucyate // BVaky_3,7.102 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2077: dharmair abhyuditaiḥ śabde niyamo na tu vastuni /
GS24vakyp1pu:2080: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca karmatvaṃ copajāyate // BVaky_3,7.104 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2082: aviśiṣṭaḥ satānyena kartā bhavati janmanaḥ // BVaky_3,7.10@ //
GS24vakyp1pu:2086: tathaiva janmarūpatvaṃ satām eke pracakṣate // BVaky_3,7.107 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2088: svā jātir vyaktirūpeṇa tasyāpi vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,7.108 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2089: bhāveṣv eva padanyāsaḥ prajñāyā vāca eva vā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2090: nāstīty apy apade nāsti na ca sad bhidyate tataḥ // BVaky_3,7.109 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2092: teṣām anyena tattvena vyavahāro na vidyate // BVaky_3,7.110 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2093: ākāśasya yathā bhedaś chāyāyāś calanaṃ yathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2094: janmanāśāv abhede 'pi tathā kaiś cit prakalpitau // BVaky_3,7.111 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2099: vikāro janmanaḥ kartā prakṛtir veti saṃśaye /
GS24vakyp1pu:2101: kḷpi saṃpadyamāne yā caturthī sā vikārataḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2103: vākye saṃpadyateḥ kartā sa“nghaś cvyantasya kathyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2105: atvaṃ saṃpadyate yas tvaṃ na tasmin yuṣmadāśrayā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2106: pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyāsti prākṛtaḥ sa vidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.117 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2109: savyāpārataraḥ kaś cit kva cid dharmaḥ pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2110: saṃsṛjyante ca bhāvānāṃ bhedavatyo 'pi śaktayaḥ // BVaky_3,7.119 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2112: gamyeta sādhanaṃ hy atra savyāpāraṃ pratīyate // BVaky_3,7.120 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2113: tvam anyo bhavasīty eṣā tatra syāt parikalpanā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2114: rājñi bhṛtyatvamāpanne yathā tadvad gatir bhavet // BVaky_3,7.121 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2118: aviśiṣṭo bhavaty anyaiḥ svatantrair muktasaṃśayaiḥ // BVaky_3,7.123 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2123: kartaiva vihitāṃ śāstre hetusaṃjñāṃ prapadyate // BVaky_3,7.125 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2124: dravyamātrasya tu praiṣe pṛcchyāder loḍ vidhīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2125: sakriyasya prayogas tu yadā sa viṣayo ṇicaḥ // BVaky_3,7.126 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2128: kriyāyāḥ prerakaṃ karma hetuḥ kartuḥ prayojakaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2136: bhedasya ca vivakṣāyāṃ pūrvāṃ pūrvāṃ kriyāṃ prati /
GS24vakyp1pu:2137: parasyā“ngasya karmatvān na kriyāgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam // BVaky_3,7.131 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2141: tasmād gatyarthakarmatve vyabhicāro na dṛśyate // BVaky_3,7.133 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2142: vikalpenaiva sarvatra saṃjñe syātām ubhe yadi /
GS24vakyp1pu:2143: ārambheṇa na yogasya pratyākhyānaṃ samaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,7.134 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2145: āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra dvairūpyaṃ bhajate kriyā // BVaky_3,7.135 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2150: saṃyogabhedād bhinnātmā gamir eva bhramir yathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2152: dravyasvabhāvo na dhrauvyam iti sūtre pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2153: apāyaviṣayaṃ dhrauvyaṃ yat tu tāvad vivakṣitam // BVaky_3,7.138 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2154: saraṇe devadattasya dhrauvyaṃ pāte tu vājinaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2155: āviṣṭaṃ yad apāyena tasyādhrauvyaṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,7.139 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2156: ubhāv apy adhruvau meṣau yady apy ubhayakarmaje /
GS24vakyp1pu:2157: vibhāge pravibhakte tu kriye tatra vivakṣite // BVaky_3,7.140 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2159: meṣayoḥ svakriyāpekṣaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak // BVaky_3,7.141 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2160: abhedena kriyaikā tu dvisādhyā ced vivakṣitā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2161: meṣāv apāye kartārau yady anyo vidyate 'vadhiḥ // BVaky_3,7.142 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2162: gatir vinā tv avadhinā nāpāya iti gamyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2163: vṛkṣasya parṇaṃ patatīty evaṃ bhāṣye nidarśitam // BVaky_3,7.143 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2165: yugapan na vivakṣyante sarve dharmā balāhake // BVaky_3,7.144 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2167: karaṇatvaṃ yato nāsti tasmāt tad ubhayaṃ saha // BVaky_3,7.145 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2168: ekaiva vā satī śaktir dvirūpā vyavatiṣṭhate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2169: nimittaṃ saṃjñayos tatra parayā bādhyate 'parā // BVaky_3,7.146 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2170: nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yo bhītrādīnāṃ ca yo vidhiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2182: idam atreti bhāvānām abhāvān na prakalpate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2183: vyapadeśas tam ākāśa- nimittaṃ saṃpracakṣate // BVaky_3,7.152 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2186: yady apy upavasir deśa- viśeṣam anurudhyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2189: aprayuktaṃ trirātrādi karma copavasau smṛtam // BVaky_3,7.155 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2193: śrutāyām aśrutāyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ so 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,7.156 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2199: proktā pratipadaṃ ṣaṣṭhī samāsasya nivṛttaye // BVaky_3,7.159 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2203: vyatirekaḥ sa dharmau dvau labhate viṣayāntare // BVaky_3,7.161 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2204: prādhānyaṃ svaguṇe labdhvā pradhāne yāti śeṣatām /
GS24vakyp1pu:2205: sahayoge svayoge 'taḥ pradhānatvaṃ na hīyate // BVaky_3,7.162 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2208: prāptābhimukhyo hy arthātmā kriyāsu viniyujyate // BVaky_3,7.163 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2209: saṃbodhanaṃ na vākyārtha iti pūrvebhya āgamaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2213: dravyaṃ tu yad yathābhūtaṃ tad atyantaṃ tathā bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:2215: tasmād yat karaṇaṃ dravyaṃ tat karma na punar bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:2216: sarvasya vānyathābhāvas tasya dravyātmano bhavet // BVaky_3,7.167 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2221: dhvaniḥ kramanivṛttau tu dhvanir ity eva kathyate // BVaky_3,8.2 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2222: śvete śvetata ity etac chvetatvena prakāśate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2227: samāpyate tato bhede kālabhedasya saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,8.5 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2228: kramāt sadasatāṃ teṣām ātmāno na samūhinām /
GS24vakyp1pu:2230: yathā gaur iti samghātaḥ sarvo nendriyagocaraḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2231: bhāgaśas tūpalabdhasya buddhau rūpaṃ nirūpyate // BVaky_3,8.7 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2237: tatraikasmin kriyāśabdaḥ kevale na prayujyate // BVaky_3,8.10 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2239: ekaḥ so 'py asadadhyāsād ākhyātair abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,8.11 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2240: kālānupāti yad rūpaṃ tad astīty anugamyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2241: paritas tu paricchinnaṃ bhāva ity eva kathyate // BVaky_3,8.12 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2243: upacāro hi mukhyasya saṃbhavād avatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,8.13 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2246: anantaraṃ phalaṃ yasyāḥ kalpate tām kriyām viduḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2247: pradhānabhūtāṃ tādarthyād anyāsāṃ tu tadākhyatā // BVaky_3,8.15 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2250: satsu pratyayarūpo 'sau bhāvo yāvan na jāyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2251: tāvat pareṣāṃ rūpeṇa sādhyaḥ sann abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,8.17 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2253: na kriyāvācināṃ tasmāt prayogas tatra vidyate // BVaky_3,8.18 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2256: asan nivartate tasmād yat sat tad upalabhyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2257: tayoḥ sadasatoś cāsāv ātmaika iva gṛhyate // BVaky_3,8.20 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2260: ante yā vā kriyābhāge jātiḥ saiva kriyā smṛtā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2261: sā vyakter anuniṣpāde jāyamāneva gamyate // BVaky_3,8.22 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2263: kriyā vyāpārabhedeṣu sattā vā samavāyinī // BVaky_3,8.23 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2264: antye vātmani yā sattā sā kriyā kaiś cid iṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2265: bhāva eva hi dhātvartha ity avicchinna āgamaḥ // BVaky_3,8.24 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2266: buddhiṃ tajjātim anye tu buddhisattām athāpare /
GS24vakyp1pu:2274: *pūrvabhāgas tu yaj jātāt taj janmety apadiśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2277: nāmaśabdāḥ pravartante saṃharanta iva kramam // BVaky_3,8.30 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2278: phalaṃ phalāpadeśo vā vastu vā tadvirodhi yat /
GS24vakyp1pu:2279: tad anyad eva pūrveṣāṃ nāga ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,8.31 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2280: naivāsti naiva nāstīti vastuno grahanād vinā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2281: kalpate pararūpeṇa vastv anyad anugamyate // BVaky_3,8.32 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2283: kaś cid vedāprakāśe 'pi prakāśe tata eva vā // BVaky_3,8.33 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2284: vyāpi saukṣmyaṃ kva cid yāti kva cit saṃhanyate punaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2285: akurvāṇo 'tha vā kiṃ cit svaśaktyaivaṃ prakāśate // BVaky_3,8.34 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2287: bhāgair iva prakḷptiś ca tāṃ kriyām apare viduḥ // BVaky_3,8.35 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2289: sādhyā ca sādhanaṃ caiva phalaṃ bhoktā phalasya ca // BVaky_3,8.36 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2290: kriyām anye tu manyante kva cid apy anapāśritām /
GS24vakyp1pu:2294: prakṛtiḥ sādhanānāṃ sā prathamaṃ tac ca kārakam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2297: saṃsarge kaś cid esāṃ tu prādhānyena pratīyate // BVaky_3,8.40 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2303: sādhyatve vā tiṅantena kṛtāṃ bhedo na kaś cana // BVaky_3,8.43 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2305: ṣaṣṭhvāḥ sā lena saṃbandhe vyudastā kartṛkarmanoḥ // BVaky_3,8.44 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2307: na saṃbhavati siddhatve sa sādhyaḥ syāt kathaṃ punaḥ // BVaky_3,8.45 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2308: etāvat sādhanaṃ sādhyam etāvad iti kalpanā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2309: śāstra eva na vākye 'sti vibhāgaḥ paramārthataḥ // BVaky_3,8.46 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2311: prakalpitā yathā śāstre sa ghañādisv api kramaḥ // BVaky_3,8.47 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2313: sattvabhāvas tu yas tasyāḥ sa ghañādinibandhanaḥ // BVaky_3,8.48 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2316: tatra yam prati sādhyatvam asiddhā taṃ prati kriyā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2317: siddhā tu yasmin sādhyatvaṃ na tam eva punaḥ prati // BVaky_3,8.50 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2318: rājñaḥ putrasya napteti na rājñi vyatiricyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2319: putrasyārthaḥ pradhānatvaṃ na cāsya vinivartate // BVaky_3,8.51 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2325: tiṅantair antareṇevam upamānaṃ tato na taiḥ // BVaky_3,8.54 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2326: sādhanatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ ca tiṅkṣu saṃbandhināṃ yataḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2327: tenādhyāropa eva syād upamā tu na vidyate // BVaky_3,8.55 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2329: kriyā caivāśraye sarvā tatra tatra samāpyate // BVaky_3,8.56 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2331: ātau tasya samāptatvād upamārtho na vidyate // BVaky_3,8.57 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2333: siddheś ca prakrame sādhyam upamātum na śakyate // BVaky_3,8.58 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2335: arthātmā bhidyate bhāve sa bāhyābhyantare kramaḥ // BVaky_3,8.59 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2336: sāmānye bhāva ity atra yal liṅgam upalabhyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2337: bhedānāṃ anumeyatvān na tat teṣu vivakṣyate // BVaky_3,8.60 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2339: upamānavidhitvāc ca bhāvād anyat pacādisu // BVaky_3,8.61 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2341: na ca liṅgam pacādināṃ bhavatau samavasthitam // BVaky_3,8.62 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2342: ekaś ca so 'rthaḥ sattākhyaḥ katham cit kaiś cid ucyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2345: sambandhibhedād arthātmā sa vidhiḥ paktibhāvayoḥ // BVaky_3,8.64 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2348: nityam ekaṃ vibhu dravyaṃ parimāṇaṃ kriyāvatām // BVaky_3,9.1 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2350: kriyābhedāya kālas tu saṃkhyā sarvasya bhedikā // BVaky_3,9.2 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2351: utpattau ca sthitau caiva vināśe cāpi tadvatām /
GS24vakyp1pu:2352: nimittaṃ kālam evāhur vibhaktenātmanā sthitam // BVaky_3,9.3 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2355: yadi na pratibadhnīyāt pratibandhaṃ ca notsṛjet /
GS24vakyp1pu:2358: na hi bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā vastu kiṃ cana vidyate // BVaky_3,9.6 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2359: naiko na cāpy aneko 'sti na śuklo nāpi cāsitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2360: dravyātmā sa tu saṃsargād evaṃrūpaḥ prakāśate // BVaky_3,9.7 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2361: saṃsargināṃ tu ye bhedā viśeṣās tasya te matāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2362: sa bhinnas tair vyavasthānāṃ kālo bhedāya kalpate // BVaky_3,9.8 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2367: sthitasyānugrahas tais tair dharmaiḥ saṃsargibhis tataḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2368: pratibandhas tirobhāvaḥ prahāṇam iti cātmanaḥ // BVaky_3,9.11 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2370: kāla eva hi viśvātmā vyāpāra iti kathyate // BVaky_3,9.12 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2374: sa kalāḥ kalayan sarvāḥ kālākhyāṃ labhate vibhuḥ // BVaky_3,9.14 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2375: pratibhaddhāś ca yās tena citrā viśvasya vṛttayaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2376: tāḥ sa evānujānāti yathā tantuḥ śakuntikāḥ // BVaky_3,9.15 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2380: kuto 'py adbhutayā vṛttyā śaktibhiḥ sā niyamyate // BVaky_3,9.17 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2381: tatas tu samavāyākhyā śaktir bhedasya bādhikā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2382: ekatvam iva tā vyaktīr āpādayati kāraṇaiḥ // BVaky_3,9.18 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2383: athāsmān niyamād ūrdhvaṃ jātayo yāḥ prayojikāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2384: tāḥ sarvā vyaktim āyānti svacche chāyā ivāmbhasi // BVaky_3,9.19 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2387: āśrayāṇāṃ ca nityatvam āśritānāṃ ca nityatā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2388: tā vyaktīr anugṛhṇāti sthitis tena prakalpate // BVaky_3,9.21 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2390: vināśāyaiva tat śṛṣṭam asvādhīnasthitiṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,9.22 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2392: naiṣāṃ sattām anudgṛhya vṛttir janmavatāṃ smṛtā // BVaky_3,9.23 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2394: sā śaktīḥ pratibadhnāti jāyante ca virodhinaḥ // BVaky_3,9.24 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2395: prayojakās tu ye bhāvāḥ sthitibhāgasya hetavaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2396: tirobhavanti te sarve yata ātmā prahīyate // BVaky_3,9.25 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2398: apadaṃ jāyate sarvaṃ tathāsyātmā prahīyate // BVaky_3,9.26 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2400: saṃbandhinā vinaikena paricchedaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,9.27 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2402: gurutvaṃ parimīyeta kālād evaṃ kriyāgatiḥ // BVaky_3,9.28 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2403: jahāti sahavṛttāś ca kriyāḥ sa samavasthitāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2404: vrīhir yathodakaṃ tena hāyanākhyāṃ prapadyate // BVaky_3,9.29 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2408: samatvaṃ viṣamatvaṃ vā sa ekaḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_3,9.31 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2411: ārambhaś ca kriyā caiva niṣṭhā cety abhidhīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2413: yāvāṃś ca dvyaṇukādīnāṃ tāvān himavato 'py asau /
GS24vakyp1pu:2414: na hy ātmā kasya cid bhettuṃ pracetuṃ vāpi śakyate // BVaky_3,9.34 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2415: anyais tu bhāvair anyeṣāṃ pracayaḥ parikalpyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2416: śanair idam idaṃ kṣipram iti tena pratīyate // BVaky_3,9.35 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2417: asataś ca kramo nāsti sa hi bhettuṃ na śakyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2418: sato 'pi cātmatattvaṃ yat tat tathaivāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,9.36 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2421: bhūtaḥ pañcavidhas tatra bhaviṣyaṃś ca caturvidhaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2422: vartamāno dvidhākhyāta ity ekādaśa kalpanāḥ // BVaky_3,9.38 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2423: kāle nidhāya svaṃ rūpaṃ prajñayā yan nigṛhyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2424: bhāvās tato nivartante tatra saṃkrāntaśaktayaḥ // BVaky_3,9.39 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2425: bhāvināṃ caiva yad rūpaṃ tasya ca pratibimbakam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2428: pravartayati kālo 'pi mātrā mātrāvatāṃ tathā // BVaky_3,9.41 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2430: vāyus tatraiva kālātmā vidhatte kramarūpatām // BVaky_3,9.42 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2431: ayanapravibhāgaś ca gatīś ca jyotiṣāṃ dhruvā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2434: nakṣatrākhyā pṛthak teṣu cihnamātraṃ tu tārakāḥ // BVaky_3,9.44 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2438: akramasyāpi viśvasya tat kālasya viceṣṭitam // BVaky_3,9.46 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2442: bhedā iva trayaḥ siddhā yāṃl loko nātivartate // BVaky_3,9.48 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2445: dvābhyāṃ sa kila śaktibhyāṃ bhāvānāṃ varaṇātmakaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2448: atītākhyā tu yā śaktis tayā janma virudhyate // BVaky_3,9.51 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2450: akramās teṣu bhāvānāṃ kramaḥ samupalabhyate // BVaky_3,9.52 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2451: dvau tu tatra tamorūpāv ekasyālokavat sthitiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2452: atītam api keṣāṃ cit punar viparivartate // BVaky_3,9.53 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2454: keṣāṃ cid vartamānatvāc caiti tadvad atītatām // BVaky_3,9.54 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2456: śāntahetūpakāraḥ san punar nopaiti darśanam // BVaky_3,9.55 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2457: dve eva kālasya vibhoḥ keṣāṃ cic chaktivartmanī /
GS24vakyp1pu:2460: ke cid buddhyanusaṃhāra- lakṣaṇaṃ taṃ pracakṣate // BVaky_3,9.57 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2461: jñānānugataśaktiṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā satyataḥ sthitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2462: kālātmānam anāśritya vyavahartuṃ na śakyate // BVaky_3,9.58 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2463: tisro bhāvasya bhāvasya keṣāṃ cid bhāvaśaktayaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2464: tābhiḥ svaśaktibhiḥ sarvaṃ sadaivāsti ca nāsti ca // BVaky_3,9.59 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2466: kramas tās tadabhedāc ca sadasattvaṃ na bhidyate // BVaky_3,9.60 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2468: adhvanām ekatā nāsti na ca kiṃ cin nivartate // BVaky_3,9.61 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2470: prathamaṃ tad avidyāyāṃ yad vidyāyāṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,9.62 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2476: abhinnam api śabdasya tattvam apracayātmakam // BVaky_3,9.65 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2480: śabdās te pratipattṝṇām upāyāḥ pratipattaye // BVaky_3,9.67 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2481: viśiṣṭam avadhiṃ taṃ tam upādāya prakalpate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2484: tāvān eva kṣaṇaḥ kālo yugamanvantarāṇi vā // BVaky_3,9.69 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2486: yad ambhasi prakṣaraṇaṃ tat kālasyaiva ceṣṭitam // BVaky_3,9.70 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2487: alpe mahati vā chidre tatsaṃbandhe na bhidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2488: kālasya vṛttir ātmāpi tam evāsyānuvartate // BVaky_3,9.71 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2489: ākrīḍa iva kālasya dṛśyate yaḥ svaśaktibhiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2490: bahurūpasya bhāveṣu bahudhā tena bhidyate // BVaky_3,9.72 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2491: tvacisārasya vā vṛddhiṃ tṛṇarājasya vā dadhat /
GS24vakyp1pu:2494: na gantṛgatibhedena mārgabhedo 'sti kaś cana // BVaky_3,9.74 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2498: bhinnam āvṛttibhedena kālaṃ kālavido viduḥ // BVaky_3,9.76 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2500: nirjñātaparimāṇā sā kāla ity abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,9.77 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2502: ataḥ kriyāntarābhāve sā kriyā kāla iṣyate // BVaky_3,9.78 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2503: bhūto ghaṭa itīyaṃ ca sattāyā eva bhūtatā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2504: bhūtā satteti sattāyāḥ sattā bhūtābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,9.79 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2505: parato bhidyate sarvam ātmā tu na vikalpyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2514: sādṛśyāt sati bhede tu tadaṅgatvena gṛhyate // BVaky_3,9.84 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2515: sad asad vāpi vastu syāt tṛtīyaṃ nāsti kiṃ cana /
GS24vakyp1pu:2516: tena bhūtabhaviṣyantau muktvā madhyaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,9.85 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2518: sad asad vāpi tenaikaṃ kramarūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,9.86 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2520: yathopalabdhi smaraṇaṃ tatra cāpy upapadyate // BVaky_3,9.87 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2522: nirvṛttirūpaṃ nirvṛtteḥ sāmānyam atha vā bhavet // BVaky_3,9.88 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2523: kāryotpattau samarthaṃ vā svena dharmeṇa tat tathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2524: ātmatattvena gṛhyeta sā cāsmin vartamānatā // BVaky_3,9.89 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2526: saṃkrāntarūpam ekatra tām āhur vartamānatām // BVaky_3,9.90 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2528: na ca bhūtam anutpannaṃ na bhaviṣyat tathāvidham // BVaky_3,9.91 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2532: bhāvy āsīd iti sūtreṇa tat kāle 'nyatra śiṣyate // BVaky_3,9.93 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2533: svakāla eva sādhutve kālabhede gatiḥ katham /
GS24vakyp1pu:2534: vākyārthād atadartheṣu viśiṣṭatvaṃ na sidhyati // BVaky_3,9.94 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2536: na syād atyantabhūtatvam evaikaṃ tatra saṃbhavet // BVaky_3,9.95 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2538: āśrayāt so 'ntaraṅgatvāt tatra sādhur bhaviṣyati // BVaky_3,9.96 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2539: āmiśra eva prakrāntaḥ sa padārthas tathāvidhaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2541: śuddhe ca kāle vyākhyātam āmiśre na prasidhyati /
GS24vakyp1pu:2546: adhyasyate viruddhe 'rthe na ca tena virudhyate // BVaky_3,9.100 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2547: bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad ity etau pratyayau vartamānatām /
GS24vakyp1pu:2558: dharmāntareṣu tad rūpam adhyasya parikalpyate // BVaky_3,9.107 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2560: tatra rūpaṃ yad adhyastaṃ tatkālaṃ tat pratīyate // BVaky_3,9.108 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2561: niṣpattāv avadhiḥ kaś cit kaś cit prativivakṣitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2564: tat sādhanāntarābhāvāt siddham ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,9.110 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2570: yaḥ samāsādanād bhedaḥ sa tatra na vivakṣitaḥ // BVaky_3,9.113 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2571: yogād vā strītvapuṃstvābhyāṃ na kiṃ cid avatiṣṭhate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2572: svasminn ātmani tatrānyad bhūtaṃ bhāvi ca kathyate // BVaky_3,9.114 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2576: sad asad vāpi caitanyam etābhyām avagamyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2577: caitanyabhāge prathamaḥ puruṣo na tu vartate // BVaky_3,10.2 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2579: samjñānārthair na caitanya- syopayogaḥ prakāśyate // BVaky_3,10.3 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2580: saṃbodhanārthaḥ sarvatra madhyame kaiś cid iṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2581: tathā saṃbodhane sarvāṃ prathamāṃ yuṣmado viduḥ // BVaky_3,10.4 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2583: svāhendraśatrur vardhasva yathā rājā bhaveti ca // BVaky_3,10.5 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2585: yuṣmadaḥ prathamāntasya paraś cen na padād asau // BVaky_3,10.6 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2587: nirdeśaś cānyathā śāstre nityatvān na virudhyate // BVaky_3,10.7 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2588: yathānirdeśam arthāḥ syur yesāṃ śāstraṃ vidhāyakam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2589: kim cit sāmānyam āśritya sthite tu pratipādanam // BVaky_3,10.8 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2590: yo 'śve yaḥ pīṭha ity atra bhūtayor aśvapīṭhayoḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2595: sa dharmo vyatirikto vā teṣāṃ ātmaiva vā tathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2597: samavetā paricchedye kva cid anyatra sā sthitā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2598: prakalpayati bhāvānāṃ saṃkhyā bhedaṃ tathātmanaḥ // BVaky_3,11.3 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2599: paratve cāparatve ca bhede tulyā śrutir yathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2602: abhedye bhedyabhāvo 'pi dravyadharmas tathā guṇe // BVaky_3,11.5 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2603: svabuddhyā tam apoddhṛtya loko 'py āgamam āśritaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2607: yathaivāviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ na kiṃ cid avabhāsate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2608: tathā bhāvo 'py asaṃsṛṣṭo na kaś cid upalabhyate // BVaky_3,11.8 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2609: bhedena tu samākhyātaṃ yal loko 'py anuvartate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2610: āgamāc chāstrasadṛśo vyavahāraḥ sa varṇyate // BVaky_3,11.9 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2611: buddhau sthiteṣu teṣv evam adhyāropo na durlabhaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2612: paradharmasya na hy atra sadasattvaṃ prayojakam // BVaky_3,11.10 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2614: saṃkhyāsu saṃkhyā liṅgeṣu liṅgam evaṃ prakalpate // BVaky_3,11.11 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2619: saṃsṛṣṭeṣv api nirbhāge bhūteṣv arthakriyā yathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2620: sattvādiṣu ca mātrāsu sarvāsv evaṃ pratīyate // BVaky_3,11.14 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2622: vinā tena na saṃkhyānām anyāsām asti saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,11.15 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2624: ekatvābhyāṃ samutpannam evaṃ vā tat pratīyate // BVaky_3,11.16 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2625: ekatvasamudāyo vā sāpekṣe vā pṛthak pṛthak /
GS24vakyp1pu:2626: ekatve dvitvam ity evaṃ tayor dvivacanaṃ bhavet // BVaky_3,11.17 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2632: ekasyāṃ buddhyanāvṛttyā, bhāgayor iva kalpanā // BVaky_3,11.20 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2634: samūhatve tu tan na syāt svāṅgādisamudāyavat // BVaky_3,11.21 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2636: āvṛttivargasaṃkhyeyā tāṃ saṃkhyāṃ tādṛśīṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,11.22 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2637: na saṃkhyāyāṃ na saṃkhyeye dvau daśety asti saṃbhavaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2638: bhedābhāvān na saṃkhyāyāṃ virodhān na tadāśraye // BVaky_3,11.23 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2640: tadrūpe vāpi saṃkhyeya āvṛttiḥ parigaṇyate // BVaky_3,11.24 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2641: saṃkhyā nāma na saṃkhyāsti saṃjñaiṣeti yathocyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2642: rūpaṃ na rūpam apy evaṃ samjñā sā hi sitādiṣu // BVaky_3,11.25 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2644: rūpatvajātiyogāc ca rūpe rūpam iti smṛtam // BVaky_3,11.26 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2645: nimittam ekam ity atra vibhaktyā nābhidhīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2646: tadvatas tu yad ekatvaṃ vibhaktis tatra vartate // BVaky_3,11.27 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2647: ekasya pracayo dṛṣṭaḥ samūhaś ca dvayos tathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2649: tad ekam api caikatvaṃ vibhaktiśravaṇād ṛte /
GS24vakyp1pu:2650: nocyate tena śabdena vibhaktyā tu sahocyate // BVaky_3,11.29 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2652: syātām asati tasmimś ca prakṛtyartho na kalpyate // BVaky_3,11.30 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2654: saguṇas tu prakṛtyartho vibhaktyarthena bhidyate // BVaky_3,11.31 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2656: ekādīnāṃ prasiddhyā tu saṃkhyeyārthatvam ucyate // BVaky_3,11.32 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2658: ya ātmanepadād bhedaḥ kva cid arthasya gamyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2659: anyataś cāpi lādeśān manyante tam upagraham // BVaky_3,12.1 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2660: kva cit sādhanam evāsau kva cit tasya viśeṣaṇam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2661: sādhanaṃ tatra karmādi vyaktavāco viśeṣaṇam // BVaky_3,12.2 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2663: lādeśaiḥ sa kriyābhedo vākyeṣv api niyamyate // BVaky_3,12.3 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2664: dhātvarthas tadviśeṣaś cāpy uktaḥ kva cid upagrahaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2665: dhātvartho gandhanādiḥ syād vyatihāro viśeṣaṇam // BVaky_3,12.4 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2667: asati vā sati vāpi vivakṣitanibandhanā // BVaky_3,12.5 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2668: kesāṃ cit kartrabhiprāye ṇicā saha vikalpate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2669: ātmanepadam anyesāṃ tadarthā prakṛtir yathā // BVaky_3,12.6 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2670: krīṇīṣva vapate dhatte cinoti cinute 'pi ca /
GS24vakyp1pu:2672: saṃvidhānaṃ pacādināṃ kva cid arthaḥ pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2675: tathābhūtā kriyā yā hi tatkartā phalabhāg yataḥ // BVaky_3,12.9 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2679: kesāṃ cid anye tu kṛtāḥ svariteto ñitas tathā // BVaky_3,12.11 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2681: tulyārtheṣv api cāvaśyaṃ na sarveṣv ekadharmatā // BVaky_3,12.12 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2683: ṇyarthopādāyinas tasmān na tulyārthāḥ pacādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,12.13 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2689: bhidyate na tu liṅgākhyo bhedas tatra tadāśritaḥ // BVaky_3,12.16 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2690: tasmād avasthite 'py arthe kasya cit pratibadhyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2691: śabdasya śaktiḥ sa tv eṣa śāstre 'nvākhyāyate vidhiḥ // BVaky_3,12.17 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2693: tat pradhānaṃ phalaṃ teṣāṃ na lābhādi prayojanam // BVaky_3,12.18 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2694: yatrobhau svāmidāsau tu prārabhete saha kriyām /
GS24vakyp1pu:2695: yugapad dharmabhedena dhātus tatra na vartate // BVaky_3,12.19 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2699: plakṣaśabdasya sāṃnidhyān nyagrodhe plakṣatā yathā // BVaky_3,12.21 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2703: ity ayaṃ śeṣaviṣayaḥ kaiś cid atrānuvarṇyate // BVaky_3,12.23 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2704: atha pratividhātā yo halaiḥ kṛṣati pañcabhiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2705: bhāṣye nodāhṛtaṃ kasmāt prāptaṃ tatrātmanepadam // BVaky_3,12.24 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2707: na syāt prāptavibhāṣāsau svaritetāṃ nivartikā // BVaky_3,12.25 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2708: śuddhe tu saṃvidhānārthe kaiś cid atreṣyate kṛṣiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2709: taddharmā yajir ity evaṃ na syāt tatrātmanepadam // BVaky_3,12.26 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2711: prāpte vibhāṣā kriyate tasmān nātrātmanepadam // BVaky_3,12.27 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2714: tadupavyañjanā jātir guṇāvasthā guṇās tathā // BVaky_3,13.1 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2716: liṅgānāṃ liṅgatattvajñair vikalpāḥ sapta darśitāḥ // BVaky_3,13.2 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2719: tisro jātaya evaitāḥ kesāṃ cit samavasthitāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2721: hastinyāṃ vaḍavāyāṃ ca strīti buddheḥ samanvayaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2722: atas tāṃ jātim icchanti dravyādisamavāyinīm // BVaky_3,13.5 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2724: tatrāsau śabdasaṃskāraḥ śabdair eva vyapāśritaḥ // BVaky_3,13.6 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2725: buddhyā kalpitarūpeṣu liṅgeṣv api ca saṃbhavaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2726: strītvādīnāṃ vyavasthā hi sā liṅgair vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,13.7 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2730: mukhyebhya iva liṅgebhyo bhedā loke vyavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,13.9 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2734: atyantādarśane na syād asattvaṃ prati niścayaḥ // BVaky_3,13.11 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2736: siddhe hi darśane kiṃ syād anumānaprayojanam // BVaky_3,13.12 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2740: trayaḥ sattvādidharmās te sarvatra samavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,13.14 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2742: kā cit pralīyate kā cit kathaṃ cid abhivardhate // BVaky_3,13.15 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2745: pravṛtter ekarūpatvaṃ sāmyaṃ vā sthitir ucyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2747: guṇā ity eva buddher vā nimittatvaṃ sthitir matā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2748: sthiteś ca sarvaliṅgānāṃ sarvanāmatvam ucyate // BVaky_3,13.18 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2750: kasya cic chabdasaṃskāre vyāpāraḥ kva cid iṣyate // BVaky_3,13.19 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2751: saṃnidhāne nimittānāṃ kiṃ cid eva pravartakam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2752: yathā takṣādiśabdānāṃ lingeṣu niyamas tathā // BVaky_3,13.20 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2754: yad yad dharme 'ṅgatām eti liṅgaṃ tat tat pracakṣate // BVaky_3,13.21 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2756: liṅgabhedāt tathā siddhāt sādhutvam anugamyate // BVaky_3,13.22 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2758: śāstram ārabhyate tatra na prayogāviparyaye // BVaky_3,13.23 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2760: nimittabhāvaḥ sādhutve vivakṣā ca vyavasthitā // BVaky_3,13.24 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2764: ekatām iva niścitya laghvartham upadarśitāḥ // BVaky_3,13.26 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2765: utpattiḥ prasavo 'nyeṣāṃ nāśaḥ saṃstyānam ity api /
GS24vakyp1pu:2766: ātmarūpaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ sthitir ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,13.27 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2767: dṛṣṭaṃ nimittaṃ kesāṃ cij jātyādivad avasthitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2768: dṛṣṭavac chabdasaṃskāra- mātraṃ tu parikalpitam // BVaky_3,13.28 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2770: nānātvaṃ janayantīva śabdā liṅge 'pi sa kramaḥ // BVaky_3,13.29 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2772: nimittadarśanād arthe kaiś cit sarvatra varṇyate // BVaky_3,13.30 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2774: indriyādi yathādṛṣṭaṃ bhedahetus tad iṣyate // BVaky_3,13.31 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2777: padaṃ svārthādayaḥ sarve yasmāt kutsādihetavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.1 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2779: kutsitasthā tu yā kutsā tadarthaḥ ko vidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.2 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2781: prakṛṣṭasya prakarṣe tu tarabādir vidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.3 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2782: kutsitatvena kutsyo vā na samyag vāpi kutsitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2784: na ca sāṃpratikī kutsā bhedābhāvāt pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2787: na prātipadikārthaś ca tatraiva vyatiricyate // BVaky_3,14.6 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2795: rūpābhedād viśeṣaṃ tam abhivyaṅktuṃ na śaknutaḥ // BVaky_3,14.10 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2799: jātisaṃbandhabhedāc ca dvitīya iva gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.12 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2802: dravyāvasthā tṛtīyā tu yasyāṃ saṃsṛjyate dvayam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2803: tayor avasthayor bhedād āśrayatve niyujyate // BVaky_3,14.14 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2805: buddhyāvasthā vibhajyante sā hy arthasya vidhāyikā // BVaky_3,14.15 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2807: tayā kalpitabhedaḥ sann arthātmā vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.16 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2809: kiṃ cid darśanam anyena darśanenāpadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.17 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2811: bhedābhedāv upādāya kva cid ekāctvam ucyate // BVaky_3,14.18 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2814: dravyātmānas trayas tasmād buddhau nānā vyavasthitāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2816: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca śabdayoḥ kaiś cid iṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2819: vṛttiḥ kṛṣṇatileṣv iṣṭā śabde dravyābhidhāyini // BVaky_3,14.22 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2821: dravyābhidhānena vinā tatas te dvandvabhāvinaḥ // BVaky_3,14.23 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2823: nimittānuvidhāyitvāt tat tilādau na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.24 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2824: evaṃ jātimati dravye pratyāsanne kriyāṃ prati /
GS24vakyp1pu:2825: guṇadharma guṇāviṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ bhedāya kalpate // BVaky_3,14.25 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2827: ajāśvādiṣu saṃbandhād rūḍhīnām iva rūḍhibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.26 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2828: tile pūrvam upātte vā tatraiva matub iṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2829: sa ca dharmaḥ samāseṣu guṇas tasmād viśeṣaṇam // BVaky_3,14.27 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2831: bhinnam atrādhikaraṇaṃ prāg vṛttes tac ca gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.28 *//
GS24vakyp1pu:2833: yadā sahavivakṣāṃ tām āhur dvandvaikaśeṣayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.29 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2835: pratyekaṃ ca samūho 'sau samūhiṣu samāpyate // BVaky_3,14.30 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2837: pratyekaṃ jātivad vṛttis tathā dvandvapadeṣv api // BVaky_3,14.31 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2839: te viṣṇumitrā iti ca bhinneṣu sahacāriṣu // BVaky_3,14.32 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2841: yābhyāṃ caikam anekārthaṃ tābhyām evāparaṃ padam // BVaky_3,14.33 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2844: duḥkhā durupapādā ca tasmād bhāṣye 'py udāhṛtā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2845: yugapadvācitā sā tu vyavahārārtham āśritā // BVaky_3,14.35 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2847: vibhāgena samākhyāne tatas tad dvyartham ucyate // BVaky_3,14.36 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2848: vākye 'pi niyatā dharmāḥ ke cid vṛttau dvayos tathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2849: te tv abhedena sāmarthya- mātra evopavarṇitāḥ // BVaky_3,14.37 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2852: vṛttir anyapadārthe yā tasyā vākyeṣv asaṃbhavaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2853: cārthe dvandvapadānāṃ ca bhede vṛttir na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.39 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2855: prāg vṛtter jātivācitvaṃ na ca gaurakharādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.40 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2857: na nityagrahaṇaṃ yuktaṃ kauṭilye yaṅvidhau yathā // BVaky_3,14.41 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2866: vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca sāmānye kaiś cid iṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2867: tathā vākyaṃ vyapekṣāyāṃ samāso 'nyatra śiṣyate // BVaky_3,14.46 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2871: svārthavat sā vyapekṣāsya vṛttāv api na hīyate // BVaky_3,14.48 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2873: saṃspṛśyāvayavāṃs te 'pi yujyante tadvatā saha // BVaky_3,14.49 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2874: abudhān praty upāyāś ca vicitrāḥ pratipattaye /
GS24vakyp1pu:2877: yuktādināṃ na śāstreṇa nivṛttyanugamaḥ kṛtaḥ // BVaky_3,14.51 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2878: śabdāntaratvād yuktādiḥ kva cid vākye prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2883: nīlotpalādy api tathā bhāgābhyāṃ vartate vinā // BVaky_3,14.54 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2886: saptaparṇādivad bhedo na vṛttau vidyate kva cit /
GS24vakyp1pu:2888: yā sāmānyāśrayā saṃjñā viśeṣaviṣayā ca yā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2889: bahulagrahaṇān nāsti pravṛttir ubhayos tayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.57 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2893: bheda eva vibhāṣāyā niyato viṣayo yataḥ // BVaky_3,14.59 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2894: yataś cāviṣayaḥ so 'syās tasmān nāsty akṛtārthatā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2896: mahākaṣṭaśritety evaṃ na syād bhedaḥ padatraye /
GS24vakyp1pu:2897: vṛttāv avayavasyāttvaṃ yasmān na pratiṣidhyate // BVaky_3,14.61 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2898: mahāraṇyam atīte tu tripadād bhidyate svaraḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2901: dvipade tena yagapat tritayaṃ na samasyate // BVaky_3,14.63 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2903: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvam api teṣāṃ na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.64 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2905: śabdāntaratvād vākye tu vṛttau nityaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.65 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2908: akarmakatve saty evaṃ ktāntaṃ bhāvābhidhāyi tat /
GS24vakyp1pu:2909: tataḥ kriyāvatā kartrā yogo bhavati karmaṇām // BVaky_3,14.67 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2911: saṃbadhyate kriyā tadvat kṛtapūrvyādiṣu sthitā // BVaky_3,14.68 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2914: putrīyatau na putro 'sti viśeṣecchā tu tādṛśī /
GS24vakyp1pu:2915: vinaiva putrānugamād yā putre vyavatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.70 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2916: prāṇair vinā yathā dhārir jīvatau prāṇakarmakaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2917: na cātra dhārir na prāṇā jīvatis tu kriyāntaram // BVaky_3,14.71 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2919: anvākhyānāya bhedās tu sadṛśāḥ pratipādakāḥ // BVaky_3,14.72 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2921: sad apīcchākyacaḥ karma vākya eva prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.73 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2923: abhyāse tulyarūpatvān na yaṅantaḥ prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.74 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2924: śabdā yathā vibhajyante bhāgair iva vikalpitaiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2925: anvākhyeyās tathā śāstram atidūre vyavasthitam // BVaky_3,14.75 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2927: padaṃ vākye pade dhātur dhātau bhāgaś ca muṇḍivat // BVaky_3,14.76 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2930: yathaiva ḍitthe davatiḥ pācake pacatis tathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2931: ḍayatiś ca paciś caiva dvāv apy etāv alaukikau // BVaky_3,14.78 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2932: prakṛtipratyayāv ūhyau padāt tābhyāṃ padaṃ tathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:2933: anubandhasvarādibhyaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ śāstraṃ na tān prati // BVaky_3,14.79 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2935: yujyate pratyavāyena śāstraṃ cakṣur apaśyatām // BVaky_3,14.80 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2939: gargādayo lukā teṣāṃ sādhutvam anugamyate // BVaky_3,14.82 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2941: bhṛgvādayaḥ prayujyeran nāpatye niyamo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.83 *//
GS24vakyp1pu:2943: praṣṭhādiṣu na jāyaiva niyamena pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.84 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2945: prasthādīnām asādhutvaṃ taddhitena vinā bhavet // BVaky_3,14.85 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2946: taddhito yogabhedena vākyaṃ vā syād vibhāṣitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2947: parimāṇādhike tatra prathamā śiṣyate punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.86 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2948: vyatiriktasya sādhutve tad eva ca nidarśanam /
GS24vakyp1pu:2953: punaś ca pratisaṃhāre vṛttim eke pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.89 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2955: nimittavati buddheś ca na nimittasarūpatā // BVaky_3,14.90 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2957: vyāpāre tannimittānāṃ na grāhyaṃ syāt tathā sthitam // BVaky_3,14.91 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2959: tasmād anupakāre vā grāhyaṃ vā na tathā sthitam // BVaky_3,14.92 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2961: vyākhyātāro vibhajyārthāṃs tān bhedena pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.93 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2964: abudhān prati vṛttiṃ ca vartayantaḥ prakalpitām /
GS24vakyp1pu:2966: anvayād gamyate so 'rtho virodhī vā nivartate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2967: dvyartham arthāntare vāpi tatrāhur upasarjanam // BVaky_3,14.96 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2968: upāyamātraṃ nānātvaṃ samūhas tv eka eva saḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2972: vācikā dyotikā vāpi saṃkhyānāṃ vā vibhaktayaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2975: saṃsargarupaṃ saiṃkhyānām avibhaktaṃ tad ucyate // BVaky_3,14.100 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2977: avibhāgena vartante tāṃ saṃkhyāṃ tādṛśīṃ viduḥ // BVaky_3,14.101 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2978: bhedānāṃ vā parityāgāt saṃkhyātmā sa tathāvidhaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2981: prakhyāyate na śuklādi- bhedarūpas tu gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.103 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2983: bhāgaḥ prakāśitaḥ kaś cic chāstre 'ṅgatvena gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.104 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2986: avyayānāṃ ca yo dharmo yaś ca bhedavatāṃ kramaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:2988: alukaś caikavadbhāvas tasmin sati na śiṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2989: sa ca goṣucarādīnāṃ dharmo 'sti vacanāntare // BVaky_3,14.107 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2990: jātau dvivacanābhāvāt tad vṛttiṣu na vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:2991: pratyākhyāne tu yogasya dravye goṣucarādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.108 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2997: abhedaikatvasaṃkhyāyāṃ godau tatra na sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.111 //
GS24vakyp1pu:2998: prāg vṛtter yuktavadbhāve ṣaṣṭhī bhedāśrayā bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:2999: vṛttau saṃkhyāviśeṣāṇāṃ tyāgād bhedo nivartate // BVaky_3,14.112 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3000: vidyamānāsu saṃkhyāsu ke cit saṃkhyāntaraṃ viduḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3001: abhedākhyam upagrāhi vṛttau tac copajāyate // BVaky_3,14.113 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3002: vyāpāraṃ yāti bhedākhyais tat svair avayavaiḥ kva cit /
GS24vakyp1pu:3003: ātmā bhedānapekṣo 'sya kva cid eti nimittatām // BVaky_3,14.114 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3004: dāsyāḥ patir iti vyakto godāv iti ca dṛśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3005: vyāpārabhedaḥ saṃkhyāyās tasmād eva vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.115 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3006: dvyādināṃ ca dviputrādau bāhyo bhedo nivartate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3007: vibhaktivācyaḥ svārthatvān nimittaṃ tv avatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.116 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3009: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād ubhaśabde na tat tathā // BVaky_3,14.117 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3010: ubhayas tatra tulyārtho vṛttau nityaṃ prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3013: ubhe iti tataḥ svārthe bhede vṛttiḥ prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.119 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3015: svabhāvād aparārthatvāt tatra bhedo na hīyate // BVaky_3,14.120 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3017: pratyayaṃ tayapaṃ hitvā nāsty uttarapade punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.121 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3019: kumāryagāre na hy asti samāso vacanāntare // BVaky_3,14.122 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3020: ekadvayor yañādināṃ vibhāṣā luṅ na kalpate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3021: yauṣmākas tāvakaś ceti bhedābhāvān na sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.123 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3022: dṛṣṭo gārgyatare bhedas tathā gargatarā iti /
GS24vakyp1pu:3025: ādeśaiḥ samjnayā vāpi vibhaktyā vyajyate vinā // BVaky_3,14.125 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3027: upādhibhūtām āśritya saṃkhyāṃ bhedena vartate // BVaky_3,14.1.26 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3028: vayasvini paricchedaḥ krīte cāpi na gamyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3029: iṣṭo 'bhedād ṛte tatra patimāṇam anarthakam // BVaky_3,14.127 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3031: taddharmatvād abhedāt tu ghaṭādibhyo na dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.128 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3032: śrūyate vacanaṃ yatra bhāvas tatra viśiṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3033: nivartate yad vacanaṃ tasya bhāvo na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.129 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3035: vākye dṛṣṭaṃ yad atyantam abhāvas tasya vṛttiṣu // BVaky_3,14.130 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3037: śrūyamānaṃ tu vacanaṃ viśiṣṭam upalabhyate // BVaky_3,14.131 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3038: abhāvo vā luko yatra rūpavān vā vidhīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3041: sarvatraiva viśeṣas tu nāvaśyaṃ tādṛśo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.133 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3042: āteś ca bhedahetutvān na liṅgena viśeṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3043: pradhānaṃ mṛgadugdhādau gārgīputre na sa kramaḥ // BVaky_3,14.134 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3044: abhede liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogāc chuklaṃ paṭā iti /
GS24vakyp1pu:3045: prasakte śāstram ārabdhaṃ siddhaye liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.135 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3047: guṇo viśeṣaṇatvena sa sūtre vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.136 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3048: śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu viśeṣā yady api śrutāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3049: vṛtter abhinnarūpatvāt teṣu vṛttir na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.137 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3051: tasmāt tadāśrayaṃ liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.138 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3052: saliṅgaṃ ca sasaṃkhyaṃ ca tato dravyābhidhāyinā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3053: saṃbadhyate padaṃ tatra tayor bhinnā śrutir bhavet // BVaky_3,14.139 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3055: liṅgasaṃkhye guṇānāṃ te sūtreṇa pratipādite // BVaky_3,14.140 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3057: yasmād viśeṣas tenātra bhedakāryaṃ na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.141 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3058: viśeṣa eva sāmānyaṃ viśesād bhidyate yataḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3059: abhedo hi viśeṣāṇām āśrito vinivartakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.142 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3060: yad yad āśrīyate tat tad anyasya vinivartakam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3061: bhedābhedavibhāgas tu sāmānye na nirūpyate // BVaky_3,14.143 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3063: nimittāvastham evātas tat svadharmeṇa gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.144 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3067: prayogeṣv eva sādhutvaṃ vākye prakramyate tadā // BVaky_3,14.146 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3069: sāmānyaṃ yat tad atyantaṃ tatraiva samavasthitam // BVaky_3,14.147 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3070: na gotvaṃ śābaleyasya gaur iti vyapadiśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3071: śuklatvaṃ bāhuleyasya śukla ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.148 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3072: vyatireke ca saty evaṃ matupaḥ śravanaṃ bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:3073: lug anvākhyāyate tasmād rasādibhyaś ca nāsti saḥ // BVaky_3,14.149 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3074: yat so 'yam iti saṃbandhād rūpābhedena vartate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3075: śuklādivat tato lopas tad rasādau na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.150 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3076: āveśo liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ kva cin mañcādivat sthitah /
GS24vakyp1pu:3077: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhe sa prasthādau na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.151 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3079: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhāt puṃśabde stryabhidhāyini // BVaky_3,14.152 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3083: ta āśraye 'pi vidyanta iti buddhir nivartyate // BVaky_3,14.154 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3089: viśeṣaṇaṃ tato dharmāñ jātes tat pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.157 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3093: bhedā bhāṣyānusāreṇa vācyās te liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.159 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3095: nyakkāriṇi syur utkṛṣṭe prakṛteḥ syād viliṅgatā // BVaky_3,14.160 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3096: kālyāṃ kālād dvitīyāntāt kāle kālyās tarab bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:3097: nyakkāriṇi tathā gārgye gargebhyaḥ pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.161 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3098: nyakkartṛṣu ca gargeṣu gārgyāt syāt tac ca neṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3099: kumāryāḥ svārthike ṅīp syāt prakṛtyartho hi nādhikaḥ // BVaky_3,14.162 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3102: upāttaṃ ca prakṛtyartho dravyam evāśrayas tayoḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3103: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād abhedena pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.164 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3104: rūpābhedāc ca tad dravyam ākāṅkṣāvat pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3105: viśeṣair bhinnarūpais tad āśrayair iva yujyate // BVaky_3,14.165 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3107: saṃkhyā ca tābhyām dravyātmā so 'bhinno vyapadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.166 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3109: kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ śetir ato bhāṣya udāhṛtaḥ // BVaky_3,14.167 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3111: karmāpadiṣṭayoḥ prāptis tatra syāl liṅgasaṃkhyayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.168 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3113: stryarthas tasyecchayā yogaḥ prakṛtyā pratyayena vā // BVaky_3,14.169 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3116: stryarthaḥ saṃstyānavad dravyaṃ prakṛtyarthaś ca yady asau /
GS24vakyp1pu:3118: saṃstyānena kva cid dravyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yady upalakṣitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3121: brāhmaṇyādau yadā vṛttās tebhyaḥ syuḥ pratyayās tadā // BVaky_3,14.173 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3125: prakṛtyarthaś ca saṃstyānaṃ svārthikāḥ pratyayās tadā // BVaky_3,14.175 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3126: saṃstyāne kevale vṛttiḥ prakṛtīnām na vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3127: tadāviṣṭe tato dravye gṛhyante samavasthitāḥ // BVaky_3,14.176 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3128: upakāri ca saṃstyānaṃ yeṣu śabdeṣv apekṣitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3129: tebhyaṣ ṭābādayas tac ca bhūtādiṣv avivakṣitam // BVaky_3,14.177 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3131: tadā dvivacanāneka- pratyayatvaṃ na sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.178 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3133: yasmād bhinnair api dravyais tad ekaṃ sad viśiṣyate // BVaky_3,14.179 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3134: mātrāṇām hi tirobhāve parimāṇam na vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3135: kumārya iti tena syāt kumāryāṃ bhedasaṃbhavāt // BVaky_3,14.180 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3137: dravye kriyāḥ pravartanta ekātmatve vyapekṣite // BVaky_3,14.181 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3139: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca kriyāyogaś ca kalpate // BVaky_3,14.182 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3141: luk taddhitalukīti syāl luk tatrāpy upalakṣaṇam // BVaky_3,14.183 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3142: kesāṃ cit tyaktabhedeṣu dravyeṣv eva vidhīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3145: kriyābhir yujyate bhedair bhāgaśaś cāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.185 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3147: strītvaṃ tu pratyayārthatvād abhidhāviṣayo yataḥ // BVaky_3,14.186 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3153: kṛte buddhyaiva bhedānām āśrayatve ca kalpite // BVaky_3,14.189 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3163: taddharmatvaṃ tato dvandve cādiṣv arthakṛtaṃ hi tat // BVaky_3,14.194 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3164: cārthaḥ śabde kva cid bhedāt kathaṃ cit samavasthitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3165: dyotakāś cādayas tasya vaktā dvandvas tu tadvatām // BVaky_3,14.195 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3167: dyotakatvān na kalpeta tasmāt sad upalakṣyate // BVaky_3,14.196 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3169: śabdaḥ kaś cit tam evārthaṃ kathaṃ cit pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.197 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3170: śabdād arthāḥ pratāyante sa bhedānāṃ vidhāyakaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3171: anumānaṃ vivakṣāyāḥ śabdād anyan na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.198 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3175: samuccayasya prādhānye śāstraṃ syāt pratipādakam // BVaky_3,14.200 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3183: nipāto liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ dvandvas tv arthasya vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.204 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3186: yasya nāsti kriyāyogaḥ svatantro 'sau na vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3187: artho dvandvasya tatra syād upādānam anarthakam // BVaky_3,14.206 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3189: nimittam api cāsyārthaḥ svadharmair yujyate tataḥ // BVaky_3,14.207 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3190: bāhyo nāsty āśrayo dvandve viśeṣau tatra hi śrutau /
GS24vakyp1pu:3193: ekaḥ samūho dharmān sa bhāgayoḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.209 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3195: yau bhedāv āśritas tatsthe liṅgasaṃkhye prapadyate // BVaky_3,14.210 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3197: caitraśabdo bahuvrihāv aprayogas tathā bhavet // BVaky_3,14.211 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3198: yathā gaur iti śuklāder abhidhānaṃ na vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3199: evaṃ yasyābhisaṃbandho gobhis tāvat pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.212 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3200: saṃbandhī niyato rūḍhaś citrāṇāṃ na ca vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3201: gavāṃ yathā vajrapāṇis tryakṣe vā 'pi vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.213 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3202: śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu viśeṣā yady api śrutāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3205: na citragur viśeṣāṇāṃ rūpābhedāt tu vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.215 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3206: yathā citragur ity etat prayukte na prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3207: evaṃ yadi syāt sāmānyaṃ tasya na syāt pratiśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.216 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3215: vibhaktyarthapradhāne ca kriyāyogo na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.220 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3219: sa prātipadikārthaś ca tathābhūtaḥ kathaṃ bhatvet // BVaky_3,14.222 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3224: bhedena tu vivakṣāyāṃ sāmānye vā vivakṣite /
GS24vakyp1pu:3226: sādhutvaṃ na vibhaktyartha- mātre vṛttasya dṛśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3227: kṛtsnārthavṛtteḥ sādhutvam ity arthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam // BVaky_3,14.226 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3228: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād dravyavṛttir ayaṃ yadā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3229: saliṅgasya sasaṃkhyasya tadā sādhutvam ucyate // BVaky_3,14.227 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3232: sādharmyam avyayena syād bahuvrīhes tathā sati /
GS24vakyp1pu:3235: vinā vibhaktyā saṃbandho vibhaktyā vidyate vinā // BVaky_3,14.230 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3239: vastvantaram upakṣiptam iti ke cit pracakṣate // BVaky_3,14.232 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3241: saṃbandhair vā viśiṣṭānāṃ tadvatāṃ syān nimittatā // BVaky_3,14.233 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3242: ke cit saṃyogino daṇḍād viṣāṇāt samavāyinaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3243: tadvati pratyayān āhur bahuvrīhiṃ tathaiva ca // BVaky_3,14.234 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3247: nimittam abbidheyaṃ vā sarvapaścād apekṣyate // BVaky_3,14.236 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3248: svāmini vyatirekaś ca vākye yady api dṛśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3249: prādhānya eva tasyeṣṭo bahuvrīhir vivakṣite // BVaky_3,14.237 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3251: asyaitā iti tatrārthe bahuvrīhir na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.238 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3252: yadā pratyavamarśas tu tāsāṃ svāmī gavām iti /
GS24vakyp1pu:3256: nānā citrā iti yathā nimittam anurudhyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3257: nānābhūte 'pi vṛttaḥ san bahuvrīhis tathā bhavet // BVaky_3,14.241 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3258: saṃbandhini nimitte tu dravyadharmo na hīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3259: liṅgābhāvo hi liṅgasya virodhitvena vartate // BVaky_3,14.242 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3261: āsanna eva dravyatvāt taddharmair na virudhyate // BVaky_3,14.243 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3262: vibhaktyarthena cāviṣṭaṃ śuddhaṃ ceti dvidhā sthitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3263: dravyaṃ śuddhasya yo dharmaḥ sa na syād anyadharmaṇaḥ // BVaky_3,14.244 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3265: granthe pūrvatra bhedas tu dvitīye 'nupradarśitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.245 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3267: dravyāśritatvaṃ hi tayos tato 'nyasya na sidhyataḥ // BVaky_3,14.246 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3273: nañsamase yatas tatra trayaḥ pakṣā vicāritāḥ // BVaky_3,14.249 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3275: abrahmaṇādiṣu nañaḥ prayogo na hi vidyate // BVaky_3,14.250 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3276: prāk samāsāt padārthānāṃ nivṛttir dyotyate nañā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3279: kriyayā yasya saṃbandho vṛttis tasya na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.252 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3283: asann iti samāse 'smin sattānyā parikalpyatām // BVaky_3,14.254 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3284: ktvānte ca tumunante ca nañsamāse na dṛśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3287: tato viśiṣṭair ādhārair yujyate brāhmaṇādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.256 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3289: yujyante sādhanādhārair nañsamāse 'pi sa kramaḥ // BVaky_3,14.257 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3292: kāmacāre ca saty evam asataḥ syāt pradhānatā, /
GS24vakyp1pu:3293: guṇatvam itareṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ vā syāt pradhānatā // BVaky_3,14.259 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3297: asatāpy anabhivyaktaṃ tādātmyaṃ vyajyate tathā // BVaky_3,14.261 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3301: jātyā bhinnāṃ tataḥ sattāṃ prasaktām apakarṣati // BVaky_3,14.263 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3303: sopākhyatvam anāśritya pratiṣedho na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.264 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3307: akṛtaś ceti saṃghātaḥ sa evābrāhmaṇe kramaḥ // BVaky_3,14.266 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3309: akṛte vā kṛtāsaṅgād aviśiṣṭaṃ kṛtākṛtāt // BVaky_3,14.267 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3313: atha jātimato 'rthasya kaś cid dharmo nivartitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.269 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3314: avaśyaṃ brāhmaṇe kaś cit kva cid dharmo na vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3315: viśeṣāvacanāt tatra nañaḥ śrutir anarthikā // BVaky_3,14.270 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3317: anvākhyānād dhi sādhutvam evaṃbhūte pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.271 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3323: nānimittā hi śabdasya pravṛttir upapadyate // BVaky_3,14.274 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3325: śabdasya vṛttir yady asti nañaḥ śrutir anarthikā // BVaky_3,14.275 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3327: tad vācyam aprasiddhatvān nañārtho vinivartyate // BVaky_3,14.276 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3328: yady apy ubhayavṛttitvaṃ pradhānaṃ tu pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3329: prasthānaṃ gamyate śuddhe tadarthe 'pi na tiṣṭhatau // BVaky_3,14.277 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3332: ayaṃ padārtha etasmin kṣatriyādau na vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3333: iti tadvacanaḥ śabdaḥ pratyayāya prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.279 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3334: buddher viṣayatāṃ prāpte śabdād arthe pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3335: pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā grutyā hy artho 'nusajyate // BVaky_3,14.280 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3337: śabdapravṛttir na tv asti loṣṭādiṣu viparyayāt // BVaky_3,14.281 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3338: anekasmād asa iti prādhānye sati sidhyati /
GS24vakyp1pu:3339: sāpekṣatvaṃ pradhānānām evaṃ yuktaṃ tvatalvidhau // BVaky_3,14.282 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3342: pradhānam atra bhedyatvād ekārtho vikṛto nañā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3343: hitvā svadharmān vartante dvyādayo 'py ekatāṃ gatāḥ // BVaky_3,14.284 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3347: dvyādibhyas teṣu tacchabdo vartate brāhmaṇādivat // BVaky_3,14.286 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3349: vṛttau tasya pradhānatvāt sā saṃkhyā na nivartate // BVaky_3,14.287 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3351: vacanāntarayoge hi na so 'rthaḥ pratiṣidhyate // BVaky_3,14.288 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3353: saṃkhyāntaraṃ tathāneka ity atrāpy abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.289 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3355: ekasmin pratiṣiddhe 'pi prāptam anyat pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.290 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3357: paryudāse tu niyataṃ saṃkhyeyāntaram ucyate // BVaky_3,14.291 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3359: arthāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi prāg ākṣipyāvatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.292 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3361: aneka iti paścāc ca tiṣṭhatīty anuṣajyate // BVaky_3,14.293 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3362: sādhyatvāt tatra siddhena kriyā dravyeṇa lakṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3363: prāg evāṅgīkṛtaṃ dravyam ataḥ pūrveṇa bhidyate // BVaky_3,14.294 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3365: vākye 'pi tena naikatva- mātram eva nivartyate // BVaky_3,14.295 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3367: tailena bhojane 'prāpte na tv anyad upasecanam // BVaky_3,14.296 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3369: yadā jātyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ kṣatriyādy apadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.297 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3371: asan brāhmaṇa ity ābhyāṃ tathānye kṣatriyādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.298 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3372: asāsno gaur iti yathā, gavayo vyapadiśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3373: jātyantaraṃ na gor eva sasnābhāvaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.299 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3379: tadrūpatvāt sa hemanta ity abhinnaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.302 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3382: na caivaṃviṣayaḥ kaś cid bahuvrīhiḥ prakalpate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3383: agur aśva iti vyāptir nañsamāsena yasya na // BVaky_3,14.304 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3387: yadā viṣayabhinnaṃ tat tadāsattvam pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.306 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3388: brāhmaṇatvena cāsattvād ucyate sat tad anyathā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3389: asad ity api sattvena sataḥ sattā nivartyate // BVaky_3,14.307 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3391: ayogo liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ syād vā sāmānyadharmatā // BVaky_3,14.308 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3393: nimittānuvidhānaṃ ca na sarvatra svabhāvataḥ // BVaky_3,14.309 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3397: prayuktair āśrayair bhinno yāti talliṅgasaṃkhyatām // BVaky_3,14.311 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3399: punaḥ pratyavamarśena vibhakta iva dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.312 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3400: samāse śrūyate svārtho yena tadvāṃs tadāśrayaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3403: asataiva tu bhedānāṃ sarveṣām upasaṃgrahaḥ // BVaky_3,14.314 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3404: te kṣatriyādibhir vācyā vācyā vā sarvanāmabhiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3407: avarṣādiṣu dosaś ca hemanto 'nyāśrayo yataḥ // BVaky_3,14.316 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3409: ekatvād ekaśabdatvaṃ nyāyyaṃ tasyāś ca varṇyate // BVaky_3,14.317 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3412: āśrayāṇāṃ hi liṅgaiḥ sā niyatair eva yujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3413: tathā ca yuktavadbhāve pratiṣedho nirarthakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.319 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3415: virodhitvāt prasajyeta nāśritaṃ tac ca laukikam // BVaky_3,14.320 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3416: sāmānyam ākṛtir bhāvo jātir ity atra laukikam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3417: liṅgaṃ na saṃbhavaty eva tenānyat parigṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.321 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3418: pravṛttir iti sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya kathyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3419: āvirbhāvas tirobhāvaḥ sthitiś cety atha bhidyate // BVaky_3,14.322 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3421: satataṃ na viyujyante vācaś caivātra saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.323 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3424: tenāsya citirūpaṃ ca citikālaś ca bhidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3425: tasya svarūpabhedas tu na kaś cid api vidyate // BVaky_3,14.325 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3428: avasthā tādṛśī nāsti yā liṅgena na yujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3429: kva cit tu śabdasaṃskāro liṅgasyānāśraye sati // BVaky_3,14.327 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3431: śāstre liṅgaṃ guṇāvasthā tathā cākṛtir iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.328 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3432: liṅgaṃ prati na bhedo 'sti dravyapakṣe 'pi kaś cana /
GS24vakyp1pu:3433: tasmāt sapta vikalpā ye saivātrāviṣṭaliṅgatā // BVaky_3,14.329 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3435: yatas tad ākṛtau śāstram anyathaiva samarthyate // BVaky_3,14.330 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3436: vartate yo bahuṣv artho 'bhede tasya vivakṣite /
GS24vakyp1pu:3437: svāśrayair vyapadiṣṭasya śāstre vacanam ucyate // BVaky_3,14.331 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3438: yadā tv āśrayabhedena bheda eva pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3439: ākṛter dravyapakṣena tadā bhedo na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.332 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3440: abhede tv ekaśabdatvāc chāstrāc ca vacane sati /
GS24vakyp1pu:3441: ekaśeṣo na vaktavyo vacanānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.333 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3443: ākṛter upakāro 'yaṃ dravyābhāvān na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.334 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3444: vyapadeśo 'bhidheyena na śāstre kaś cid āśritaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3445: dravyaṃ nāma padārtho yo na ca sa pratiṣidhyate // BVaky_3,14.335 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3447: upakāri guṇaḥ śeṣaḥ parārtha iti kalpanā // BVaky_3,14.336 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3449: ākṛtau vā pradhānatvam ata evaṃ samarthyate // BVaky_3,14.337 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3451: na vṛttivat parārthasya guṇabhāvas tu varṇyate // BVaky_3,14.338 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3455: ākhyāteṣv ekaśabdāyā jāter dravyaṃ tathocyate // BVaky_3,14.340 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3458: so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād āśrayair ākṛteḥ saha /
GS24vakyp1pu:3462: pākau pākā iti yathā bhedakaḥ kaiś cid āśrayaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3465: ādhāradharmān sāmānyaṃ purastāt tad vicāritam // BVaky_3,14.345 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3467: aśabdavācyāt saṃbandhād vyaktir apy upajāyate // BVaky_3,14.346 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3469: dravyaṃ tadāśrayo bhedo jāteś cābhyupagamyate // BVaky_3,14.347 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3471: tattvenāha tathā jāti- śabdo dravyeṣu vartate // BVaky_3,14.348 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3473: jātir utsṛṣṭasaṃkhyā tu dravyātmany anuṣajyate // BVaky_3,14.349 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3474: asyedam iti vā yatra so 'yam ity api vā śrutiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3475: vartate paradharmeṇa tad anyad abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.350 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3476: yat pradhānaṃ na tasyāsti svarūpam anirūpanāt /
GS24vakyp1pu:3479: saṃsargaśrutir artheṣu sākṣād eva na vartate // BVaky_3,14.352 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3480: jātau vṛtto yadā dravye sa śabdo vartate punaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3481: jāter eva padārthatvaṃ na tadābhyupagamyate // BVaky_3,14.353 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3483: pratipatter upāyeṣu na tattvam anugamyate // BVaky_3,14.354 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3485: dravyasya sati saṃsparśe tadā jātipadārthatā // BVaky_3,14.355 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3486: dravyasya sati saṃsparśe dravyam āśrīyate yadā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3487: vācyaṃ tenaiva śabdena tadā dravyapadārthatā // BVaky_3,14.356 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3489: yadā saṃbandhavaj jātiḥ sāpi dravyapadārthatā // BVaky_3,14.357 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3494: anirjātasya nirjñānaṃ yena tan mānam ucyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3505: śyāmatvam ekaṃ guṇayor ubhayor api vartate // BVaky_3,14.365 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3506: yenaiva hetunā śyāmā śastrī tatra pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3507: sa hetur devadattāyāḥ pratyaye na viśiṣyate // BVaky_3,14.366 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3508: āśrayād yo guṇe bhedo jāter yā cāviśiṣṭatā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3509: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ dravyātmā savyāpāraḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.367 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3513: śastryādinām upādāne tatra nāsti prayojanam // BVaky_3,14.369 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3514: aśabdavācyo yo bhedaḥ śyāmamātre na vartate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3515: śyāmeṣu keṣu cid vṛttir yasya so 'tra vyapekṣyate // BVaky_3,14.370 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3516: śyāmeṣu keṣu cit kiṃ cit kiṃ cit sarvatra vartate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3517: sāmānyaṃ kaś cid ekasmiñ chyāme bhedo vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.371 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3518: tathā hi sati saurabhye bhedo jātyutpalādiṣu /
GS24vakyp1pu:3519: gandhānāṃ sati bhede tu sādṛśyam upalabhyate // BVaky_3,14.372 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3520: guṇānām āśrayād bhedaḥ svato vāpy anugamyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3521: anirdeśyād viśeṣād vā saṃkarād vā guṇāntaraiḥ // BVaky_3,14.373 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3523: upameyatvam ādhikye sāmye vā na nivartate // BVaky_3,14.374 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3524: anyais tu mānaṃ jātyādi bhedyasyārthasya varṇyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3525: anirjñātasvarūpo hi jñeyo 'rthas tena mīyate // BVaky_3,14.375 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3526: mitas tu svena mānena prasiddho yo guṇāśrayaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3529: bhinnena yasya bhedyānām upamānaṃ tad ucyate // BVaky_3,14.377 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3532: śastrīkumāryoḥ sadṛśaḥ śyāma ity evam āśrite /
GS24vakyp1pu:3533: vyapadeśyam aneneti nimittaṃ guṇayoḥ sthitam // BVaky_3,14.379 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3537: luptopamāni tāny āhus taddharmeṇa samāśrayāt // BVaky_3,14.381 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3538: śastryāṃ prasiddhaṃ śyāmatvaṃ mānaṃ sā tena mīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3539: anyā śyāmā tu tadrūpā tenātyantaṃ na mīyate // BVaky_3,14.382 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3546: sādhāraṇaṃ bruvan dharma kva cid eva vyavasthitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3549: bhinnayor dharmayor ekaḥ śrūyate 'nyaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.387 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3552: mānaṃ prati samīpaṃ vā sādṛśyena pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3553: paricchedād dhi sādṛśyam iha mānopamānayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.389 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3555: bhedasyaiva vyapekṣāyām anyad eveti gamyate // BVaky_3,14.390 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3557: atyantaikatvaviṣayo na syāt tenātra samśayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.391 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3558: bhede 'pi tulyarūpatvāc chālīmṃ tān iti dṛśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3559: jātyabhedāt sa evāyam iti bhinno 'bhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.392 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3560: kathaṃ hy avayavo 'nyasya syād anya iti cocyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3561: atyantabhede nānātvaṃ yatra tattvaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.393 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3563: saṅghinor na tv abhedo 'sti tathānyatvam udāhṛtam // BVaky_3,14.394 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3565: yo hi gaur iti vijñāne hetuḥ so 'sti gavāntare // BVaky_3,14.395 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3567: na kaś cid upakāro 'sti buddher buddhyantaraṃ prati // BVaky_3,14.396 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3568: kiṃ cid yatrāsti sāmānyaṃ yadi bhedāś ca ke cana /
GS24vakyp1pu:3569: gotvaṃ goṣv asti sāmānyaṃ bhedāś ca śabalādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.397 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3570: sāmānyaṃ śyāmatānyaiva tad dhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayoḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3571: tad eva siddhyasiddhibhyāṃ bheda ity apadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.398 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3572: śyāmatvam eva sāmānyam anyeṣām ubhayoḥ sthitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3573: saṃpūrnatvāt tad anyasmād viśeṣa iti gamyate // BVaky_3,14.399 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3574: ākṛtau vāpi sāmānye kva cid eva vyavasthitāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3575: śyāmādau ye 'vasīyante viśeṣās ta ihāśritāḥ // BVaky_3,14.400 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3576: jāter abhede bhede vā sādṛśyaṃ tat pracakṣate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3577: kaś cit kadā cit arthātmā tathābhūto 'padiśyate // BVaky_3,14.401 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3578: yatrārthe pratyayābhedo na kadā cid vikalpate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3579: avidyamānabhedatvāt sa eka iti gamyate // BVaky_3,14.402 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3583: vyaktibhāgāśrayā buddhis tatra bhedena jāyate // BVaky_3,14.404 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3585: nimittaṃ punar anyatra nānātveneva gṛhyate // BVaky_3,14.405 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3587: sa sādṛśyasya viṣaya ity anyair apadiśyate // BVaky_3,14.406 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3592: śyāmatvam upamāne ced vṛttaṃ vṛttau prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3594: ṭābanta eva caitrādau śyāmāśabdas tathā bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:3595: sūtre ca prathamābhāvān na śyāmādyupasarjanam // BVaky_3,14.410 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3597: naivaṃ tittirikalmāṣyām iṣṭaḥ strīpratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.411 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3598: satiśiṣṭabalīyastvād bāhye ṅiṣi ca saty api /
GS24vakyp1pu:3599: upamānasvaro na syāt tasmāt stryantaḥ samasyate // BVaky_3,14.412 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3601: pradhānasya tathā na syād vyāghrādau liṅgadarśanam // BVaky_3,14.413 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3605: upamāneṣv anirdiṣṭaḥ sāmarthyāt sa pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.415 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3607: viśiṣṭa eva candrastho guṇo nopaplavādayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.416 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3611: mṛgīva capalety atra puṃvadbhāvo na sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.418 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3613: yathaiva mṛgadugdhādau na cet stryartho vivakṣyate // BVaky_3,14.419 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3615: tasyām evobhayaṃ tasmād ucyate śāstravigrahe // BVaky_3,14.420 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3617: bahv apekṣyam atas tasyām ubhayapratipādanam // BVaky_3,14.421 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3618: śyāmā śastrī yathā śyāmā śastrīkalpeti cocyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3620: atha śyāmeva śastrīyaṃ śyāmety evaṃ prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3621: śastrī yatheyam śyāmeti tāvad eva pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.423 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3623: pṛthag dvayoḥ śruto 'py eṣa neṣṭasvārthasya vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.424 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3624: upameyaṃ tu yad vācyaṃ tasya cet pratipādane /
GS24vakyp1pu:3625: savyāpārā guṇās tatra sarvasyoktiḥ sakṛcchrutau // BVaky_3,14.425 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3628: sādṛśyamātraṃ sāmānyaṃ dviṣṭhaṃ kaiś cit pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3629: guṇo bhede 'py abhedena dvivṛttir vā vivakṣitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.427 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3631: rūpāt sāmānyavācitvaṃ prāg vā vṛtter udāhṛtam // BVaky_3,14.428 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3635: bhinne 'dhikaraṇe vṛttes tatra naivāsti saṃbhavaḥ // BVaky_3,14.430 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3638: pūjopādhiś ca yo dṛṣṭaḥ kutsanopādhayaś ca ye /
GS24vakyp1pu:3639: teṣāṃ bhinnanimittatvān niyamārthā punaḥ śrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.432 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3640: asaṃbhave 'pi vā vṛtteḥ syād etal liṅgadarśanam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3641: acver iti yathā liṅgam abhāve 'pi bhṛśādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.433 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3644: kriyety upādhiḥ prāthamyāt prakṛtyarthasya yady api /
GS24vakyp1pu:3645: na prātipadikaṃ tatra kriyāvācy upapadyate // BVaky_3,14.435 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3646: sattvavṛttasya śeṣe vā tṛtīyā sādhane 'pi vā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3647: tiṅām asattvavācitvād ubhayaṃ tan na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.436 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3649: na kriyety apadiśyante kṛtvo 'rthapratyaye yathā // BVaky_3,14.437 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3651: teṣām asattvavācitvaṃ tiṅantair na viśiṣyate // BVaky_3,14.438 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3654: na kevalau dravyaguṇau tadvān vāpy upamīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3655: śayitavyādibhis teṣu nopamārtho 'sti kaś cana // BVaky_3,14.440 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3658: hotavyasadṛśo hotety atrāpy artho na vidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3659: virodhāt kriyayā tasmāt kriyāvān nopamīyate // BVaky_3,14.442 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3661: jātibhede 'pi pākena bhinnāḥ pākādayaḥ kriyāḥ // BVaky_3,14.443 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3663: adhyetavyena viprāṇāṃ tulyam adhyayanaṃ viśām // BVaky_3,14.444 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3665: sāmarthyād anapekṣasya tasya vṛttiḥ prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.445 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3667: kriyāvad api kāryāṇāṃ darśanāt pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.446 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3669: gamanaṃ kārakasyeti ṇvuly anyasmin na saṃbhavet // BVaky_3,14.447 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3671: śuddhāyāḥ saṃbhavān na syāt kriyāyā brāhmaṇādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.448 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3673: kriyāyā na śrutād yasmād upamānaṃ samāpyate // BVaky_3,14.449 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3674: tṛtīyo 'py āśrito bhedo dharmaḥ sādhāraṇo dvayoḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3675: vyāpāravān na kṛtsnasya sāmyaṃ kṛtsnena vidyate // BVaky_3,14.450 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3676: dravye vāpi kriyāyāṃ vā nimittāt tat prakalpate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3677: kriyāṇāṃ vidyamānatvād vṛttir na syād gavādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.451 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3678: abhāvāt kevalāyās tu tadvān arthaḥ pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3683: dravyavad guṇaśabde 'pi sa nimittam apekṣate // BVaky_3,14.454 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3684: yo ya uccāryate śabdaḥ sa svarūpanibandhanaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3685: yathā tathopamāneṣu vyapekṣa na nivartate // BVaky_3,14.455 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3688: antarbhūte tu karaṇe prayogo na punar bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:3689: nyāyenāyuktam ity atra jīvatau prāṇakarmavat // BVaky_3,14.457 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3690: śāstrābhyāsāc ca bhedo 'yam ayuktam iti varṇyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3691: aśobhanam asaṃbaddham iti rūḍhir vyavasthitā // BVaky_3,14.458 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3692: vivibhaktiḥ prakṛtyarthaṃ praty upādhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:3696: sārūpyāt tu tad evedam iti tatropacaryate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3697: śabdāntaraṃ vibhaktyā tu yuktaṃ śāstre tad aśrutam // BVaky_3,14.461 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3698: prakṛtiś cet tṛtīyāntā tenety asmāt pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3699: kriyeti prathamāntā sā kathaṃ bhavitum arhati // BVaky_3,14.462 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3700: kriyayeti tṛtīyā ca prayoge kasya kalpyatām /
GS24vakyp1pu:3701: tenety asya hi saṃbandhaḥ sūtrasthena na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.463 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3703: tena yat tat tṛtīyāntaṃ kriyā cet seti gamyate // BVaky_3,14.464 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3704: upādheḥ kasya cid vākye prayoga upalabhyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3705: pratīyamānadharmānyo na kadā cit prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.465 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3706: nīlam utpalam ity atra na viśeṣye na bhedake /
GS24vakyp1pu:3707: kaś cit taddharmavacano vākye śabdaḥ prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.466 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3708: atyantānugamāt tatra na sūtre na ca vigrahe /
GS24vakyp1pu:3709: vibhaktipariṇāmena kiṃ cid asti prayojanam // BVaky_3,14.467 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3710: tṛtīyāntaṃ kriyety etad vigrahe na prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3711: yathā daṇḍaḥ praharaṇaṃ krīḍāyām iti dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.468 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3712: ghavidhau yac ca saṃjñāyām iti sūtra udāhṛtam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3713: upādānaṃ prayogeṣu tasyātyantaṃ na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.469 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3715: te bhede 'pi vibhaktīnāṃ nirdiśyanta upādhayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.470 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3717: śabdās tat tv avivakṣāyāṃ samuccayavikalpayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.471 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3719: bhedādhiṣṭhānayā yogas tesāṃ bhavati saṃkhyayā // BVaky_3,14.472 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3720: sarvair viśiṣṭās tair arthair janyante sahacāribhiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3721: buddhayaḥ pratipattṝṇāṃ śabdārthāṃs tān ato viduḥ // BVaky_3,14.473 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3724: kevalānāṃ tu bhāvānāṃ na rūpam avadhāryate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3725: anirūpitarūpeṣu teṣu śabdo na vartate // BVaky_3,14.475 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3727: vartate 'vayave nāpi nopāttaṃ tyajate kva cit // BVaky_3,14.476 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3730: samūhe ca pradeśe ca pañcālā iti dṛśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3731: tathā viśeṣaṇaṃ sarva ity etad upapadyate // BVaky_3,14.478 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3733: ardhaṃ ca pippalī ceti khande śabdaḥ pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.479 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3735: tatrānyasya nivṛttyarthe śabde bhedo na gamyate // BVaky_3,14.480 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3738: yad upavyañjanaṃ jāteḥ sahacāri ca karmasu /
GS24vakyp1pu:3739: tatra vā rūḍhasaṃbandhaṃ yat prāyeṇopalakṣitam // BVaky_3,14.482 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3740: samudāyaḥ pradeśo vety evaṃ tasminn anāśrite /
GS24vakyp1pu:3742: yaś ca tulyaśrutir dṛṣṭaḥ samudāye vyavasthitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3749: guṇais te 'py ekadeśasthāḥ paṭādīnāṃ viśeṣakāḥ // BVaky_3,14.487 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3751: tadā tailādivat teṣāṃ jātiśabdatvam ucyate // BVaky_3,14.488 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3752: nivṛttyarthā śrutir yeṣāṃ bhedas teṣv anapekṣitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3753: pradeśe samudāye vā guṇo 'nyeṣāṃ nivartakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.489 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3755: sādṛśyaṃ tatra dṛṣṭaṃ hi kṣatriyādhyayanādibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.490 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3757: vaktavyaṃ kena dharmeṇa tulyatvaṃ kriyayor iti // BVaky_3,14.491 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3761: caitrāt ṣaṣṭhī prasajyeta yoge śattryādibhir yathā // BVaky_3,14.493 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3763: saṃpradānādiyogaś ca kriyāmātre na kalpate // BVaky_3,14.494 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3765: pāṭhaḥ kadā cit kartavyas tulyau pakṣāv ubhau yataḥ // BVaky_3,14.495 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3766: jahāti jātiṃ dravyaṃ vā tasmān nāvayave sthitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3767: kriyāyās tu śrutir yasmāt tadvaty arthe 'vatiṣṭhate // BVaky_3,14.496 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3771: apekṣaṇīyā śuddhe 'rthe tasmād vṛttir na kasya cit // BVaky_3,14.498 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3772: sarvaṃ vāpy ekadeśo vā yasminn āśriyate kva cit /
GS24vakyp1pu:3773: viśeṣavṛttiṃ taṃ sarvam āhur bhede vyavasthitam // BVaky_3,14.499 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3774: samuccayo vikalpo vā prakārāḥ sarva eva vā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3775: viśeṣā iti varṇyante sāmānyaṃ vāvikalpitam // BVaky_3,14.500 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3776: na hi brāhmaṇa ity atra bhedaḥ kaś cid apāśritaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3777: apākṛto vā tenāyaṃ samudāye vyavasthitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.501 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3778: kriyā tv āśrīyate yasmin sa bhedo 'dhyavasīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3779: tathānyathā sarvathā cety aprayoge na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.502 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3785: adhyetā brāhmaṇa iva pratyayo na nivartate // BVaky_3,14.505 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3786: adhīte tulya ity evaṃ puṃlliṅgena viśeṣaṇam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3787: kriyāvati kriyāyāṃ tu tulyaśabde napuṃsakam // BVaky_3,14.506 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3789: putreṇa tulyaḥ kapila iti vṛttiḥ prasajyate // BVaky_3,14.507 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3790: yāḥ putre rūḍhasaṃbandhāḥ kriyā loke vivakṣitāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3791: tābhiḥ kriyāvataḥ putrād guṇatulye vatir bhavet // BVaky_3,14.508 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3792: antarbhūtaṃ nimittaṃ ca rūḍhiśabdeṣu yady api /
GS24vakyp1pu:3793: kriyās tu sahacāriṇyo rūḍhāḥ santi padārthavat // BVaky_3,14.509 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3799: animittaṃ vates tulyaṃ yātīty atreṣyate vatiḥ // BVaky_3,14.512 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3800: dvayaṃ viśeṣyate tena yad ekatra viśeṣaṇaṃ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3801: tulyaśabdo hi taṃ dharmam ubhayastham apekṣate // BVaky_3,14.513 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3803: tulayā saṃmitaṃ tulyam iti tatropapadyate // BVaky_3,14.514 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3804: sūtre śrutaś ca dviṣṭho 'sāv abhedena pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3805: na ca sāmānyaśabdatvād aśrutā gamyate kriyā // BVaky_3,14.515 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3807: ye dharmā niyatās teṣāṃ putrādiṣu na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.516 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3809: kriyāyāḥ śravaṇe sāpi kriyāvattā pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.517 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3813: vidyate lakṣaṇārthatvaṃ nāsti tena kriyāśruteḥ // BVaky_3,14.519 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3816: yadā kriyānimittaṃ tu sādṛśyaṃ syāt kriyāvatoḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3818: avyayeṣu vateḥ pāṭhaḥ kāryas tatra svarādivat /
GS24vakyp1pu:3819: brāhmaṇena samo 'dhyetety atra ca pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.522 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3821: tulyam ity anyathā kalpyo vākyaśeṣo 'śruto bhavet // BVaky_3,14.523 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3823: adhyetrā sadṛśo 'dhyetety atra nāsti vater vidhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.524 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3824: tulyārthair iti yā tasyās tṛtīyāyā na bhidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3825: artho bhede 'pi sarvābhir itarābhir vibhaktibhiḥ // BVaky_3,14.525 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3826: bhojyate brāhmaṇa iva tulyaṃ bhuktaṃ dvijātinā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3827: paśyati brāhmaṇam iva tulyaṃ vipreṇa paśyati // BVaky_3,14.526 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3829: dīyatāṃ brāhmaṇāyeva tulyaṃ vipreṇa dīyatām // BVaky_3,14.527 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3830: brāhmaṇād iva vaiśyāt tvam adhīṣvādhyayanaṃ bahu /
GS24vakyp1pu:3831: ity evamādibhir bhedas tṛtīyāyā na kaś cana // BVaky_3,14.528 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3832: tulyaṃ madhurayādhīye mātrā tulyaṃ smarāmi tām /
GS24vakyp1pu:3833: madhurāyāś ca mātuś ca kathaṃ sādṛśyakalpanā // BVaky_3,14.529 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3837: vartate gṛhatulye ca prāsāde madhurāśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.531 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3839: tathā kriyāgatair dharmair ucyante sādhanāśrayāḥ // BVaky_3,14.532 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3840: ivārthe yac ca vacanaṃ pūrvasūtre ca yo vidhiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3841: kriyāśabdaśrutau bhedo na kaś cid vidyate tayoḥ // BVaky_3,14.533 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3842: yady apy upādhir anyatra niyato na prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3843: rūpābhedāt tv anirjñātā kriyātra śrūyate punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.534 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3845: saty api pratyayārthatve bhedābhāvād udāhṛtāḥ // BVaky_3,14.535 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3846: evaṃ ca sati pūrveṇa siddho 'trāpi vater vidhiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3847: niyame vābhidhāne vā bhidyate na kriyāśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.536 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3849: kriyāṇām eva sadṛśve pūrvasūtre vidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.537 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3851: ity atra dravyaguṇayoḥ pūrveṇa na vatir bhavet // BVaky_3,14.538 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3853: ṛte kriyāyā grahaṇāt pūrvayogena sidhyati // BVaky_3,14.539 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3856: na kā cid ivayoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhino /
GS24vakyp1pu:3857: ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate tatra pūrveṇa pratyayo bhavet // BVaky_3,14.541 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3859: ṣaṣṭhītṛtīye tatra stas tulyaśabdo hi vācakaḥ // BVaky_3,14.542 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3861: nādhikyam upamāne 'sti dyotakaḥ sa prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.543 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3864: gavayena samo 'nadvān iti vṛttis tathā bhavet /
GS24vakyp1pu:3865: na tv asti gaur ivety atra vyatireka ivāśrayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.545 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3867: vyatireke vater bhāvo na tulyārthatvahetuke // BVaky_3,14.546 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3869: prakṛtāṃ tām atas tyaktvā vibhaktyantaraṃ āśritam // BVaky_3,14.547 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3870: saptamy api na tatrāsti jñāpakārthā tu sā kṛtā /
GS24vakyp1pu:3871: iṣṭā sā śeṣaviṣaye niyatāsu vibhaktiṣu // BVaky_3,14.548 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3875: saptamy evocyate sarvā na santy anyā vibhaktayaḥ // BVaky_3,14.550 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3877: bādhitā vinivarteta ṣaṣṭhī sā gṛhyate punaḥ // BVaky_3,14.551 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3879: arhārthe 'pi vatiḥ siddhaḥ sa tv ekena nidarśyate // BVaky_3,14.552 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3880: tena tulyam iti prāpte kriyopādhiḥ prasidhyati /
GS24vakyp1pu:3881: rājavad vartate rājety atra bhede vivakṣite // BVaky_3,14.553 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3886: rājavad rūpam asyeti rājany eva vivakṣite /
GS24vakyp1pu:3890: kṛtahastavad ity etat prasiddheṣv eva dṛśyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3891: rājatvena prasiddhe ca rājñi rājavad ity api // BVaky_3,14.558 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3893: te rājani niyamyante tyajyante vyabhicāriṇaḥ // BVaky_3,14.559 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3894: arhateś ca kriyā kartrī yā tasyāṃ vatir iṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3895: rājānam arhati cchattram iti na tv evamādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.560 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3897: chattrādyarthe tu vacane pratyākhyānaṃ na saṃbhavet // BVaky_3,14.561 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3903: prayogaḥ so 'pi caitasya viṣaye vidyate vateḥ // BVaky_3,14.564 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3905: anyatra dṛṣṭakarmendro yathety asmin vivakṣite // BVaky_3,14.565 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3907: sadṛśas tvaṃ tavaiveti tatraivam abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.566 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3911: tenāsmin viṣaye bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.568 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3913: caitram īdṛśam ity āha buddhyavasthāparigrahāt // BVaky_3,14.569 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3917: janyanta iva śabdānām arthāḥ sarve vivakṣayā // BVaky_3,14.571 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3919: na tatra kaś cit sādṛśyaṃ sad api pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.572 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3920: atyantaṃ viṣaye bhinne yāvat prakhyā na bhidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3921: na tāvat pratyabhijñānaṃ kasya cid vinivartate // BVaky_3,14.573 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3922: ayam eva tu sūtreṇa bhedo bhedena darśitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3923: prasiddham api durjñānam abudhaḥ pratipadyate // BVaky_3,14.574 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3925: vaiyākaraṇavad brūṣvety ataḥ so 'py abhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.575 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3926: ke cit pumāṃso bhāṣante strīvat puṃvac ca yoṣitaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3928: sadṛśas tvaṃ tavaiveti loke yad abhidhīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3930: yuktam aupayikaṃ rājña ity arthasya nidarśane /
GS24vakyp1pu:3935: upasargād vatau siddhā dhātau dhātvarthakalpanā // BVaky_3,14.580 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3936: svaṃ rūpam iti caitasminn arthasyāpi parigrahaḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3937: rūpavaj jñāpitas tasmād āsanno 'rtho grahīṣyate // BVaky_3,14.581 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3939: dhātunā kṛtam ity evam asmin sūtre pratīyate // BVaky_3,14.582 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3940: yaḥ śabdaś caritārthatvād atyantaṃ na prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3942: kriyāyāṃ sādhane dravye prādayo ye vyavasthitāḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3943: tebhyaḥ sattvābhidhāyibhyo vatiḥ svārthe vidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.584 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3944: pratyayena vinā prādis tatrārthe na prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3945: bhedena tu samākhyāne vibhāgaḥ parikalpitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.585 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3947: vibhaktibhir niyogaḥ syād yathaiva tasilādiṣu // BVaky_3,14.586 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3949: teṣām udvata ity atra vaktavyā savibhaktitā // BVaky_3,14.587 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3950: vatyarthaṃ nāvagāhete puṃvad ity asya darśanāt /
GS24vakyp1pu:3951: nañsnañāv apavādasya bādhakaṃ tan nipātanam // BVaky_3,14.588 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3952: etam utkrāmato nūnaṃ vatyarthaṃ nañsnañāv iti /
GS24vakyp1pu:3953: tayoḥ pravṛttāv utsargo bādhanān nopapadyate // BVaky_3,14.589 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3954: nañsnañau vihitau yena sa yogo nāvagāhate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3955: vatiprakaraṇaṃ tad dhi liṅgam evaṃ samarthyate // BVaky_3,14.590 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3959: paśū rudra iva hy etāv ity ekavacanaśrutiḥ // BVaky_3,14.592 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3960: upamānasya bhedāc ca bahuṣu syād año vidhiḥ /
GS24vakyp1pu:3961: kāśyapā iti lopaḥ syāt tathā pratikṛtiṣv api // BVaky_3,14.593 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3963: lum manuṣye tathoktaṃ syāl liṅgasyaikasya siddhaye // BVaky_3,14.594 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3964: upameyeṣu bhinneṣu kiṃ cid ekaṃ pravartate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3965: pratyayasya vidhau tatra nityaṃ yuktavad iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.595 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3966: yadā pratyupameyaṃ tu tad ekaikam avasthitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3970: pracaye bhidyamāne tu saṃkhyā pūleṣu bhidyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3971: arthabhedo lubanteṣu naivaṃ kaś cana dṛśyate // BVaky_3,14.598 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3973: upamānasya tatrānyaiḥ saṃkhyāyā bheda iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.599 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3975: pākāder aprayoge tu bhinnā saṃkhyābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.600 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3976: yaḥ saṃbandhigato bhedaḥ sa prayoge pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3977: saṃbandhinām ato bheda upameye na gamyate // BVaky_3,14.601 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3980: upamānaṃ samastānām abhinnam śrūyate kva cit /
GS24vakyp1pu:3982: yathā garuḍa ity etad vyūhāpekṣaṃ prayujyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3983: ekena yatra sādṛśyaṃ vainateyena hastinām // BVaky_3,14.604 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3986: meghāḥ śaila ivety ukte samastānāṃ pratīyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:3987: sādṛśyam giriṇaikena pratyekaṃ tena bhidyate // BVaky_3,14.606 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3989: kākatālīyam ity atra prasiddham hy upalakṣaṇam // BVaky_3,14.607 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3990: rājāśvādiś ca viṣayaḥ syād anyo vety aniścitam /
GS24vakyp1pu:3991: tena cchasya vidhānāt prāg vyapadeśo na vidyate // BVaky_3,14.608 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3995: dasyor abhinipātas tu tālasya patanaṃ yathā // BVaky_3,14.610 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3997: vadhādir upameye 'rthe tayā chavidhir iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.611 //
GS24vakyp1pu:3999: pātāgamanayoḥ kāka- tālaśabdau tathā sthitau // BVaky_3,14.612 //
GS24vakyp1pu:4000: yad anvākhyāyakaṃ vākyaṃ tad evaṃ parikalpyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:4001: prayogavākvaṃ yal loke tad evaṃ na prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.613 //
GS24vakyp1pu:4004: kākasya tālena yathā vadho yasya tu dasyunā /
GS24vakyp1pu:4005: tatra citrīkṛte 'nyasminn upameye cha iṣyate // BVaky_3,14.615 //
GS24vakyp1pu:4011: bṛhatka iti tatraiṣa maṇau śabdaḥ prayujyate // BVaky_3,14.618 //
GS24vakyp1pu:4012: sādṛśyam eva sarvatra prakāraḥ kaiś cid iṣyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:4013: bhede 'pi tu prakārākhyā kaiś cid abhyupagamyate // BVaky_3,14.619 //
GS24vakyp1pu:4015: prakāramātre vartitvā kaś cit tadvati vartate // BVaky_3,14.620 //
GS24vakyp1pu:4019: sa cāyam avyayībhāve bhedo bhedena darśitaḥ // BVaky_3,14.622 //
GS24vakyp1pu:4020: sādṛśyaṃ yogyatā kaiś cid anāv abhyupagamyate /
GS24vakyp1pu:4021: yat tu mūrtigataṃ sāmyaṃ tat sahenābhidhīyate // BVaky_3,14.623 //
GS24vakyp1pu:4024: gaur vāhīka iti dvitve sādṛśyaṃ pratyudāhṛtam /
GS24vakyp1pu:4025: śuklādau sati niṣpanne vāhīko na dvir ucyate // BVaky_3,14.625 //
